source: Sayyid Abul Ala Maududi - Tafhim al-Qur'an - The Meaning of the Quran
short_text: 'Nuh' is the name of this Surah as well as the title of its subject matter, for in it, from beginning to the end, the story of the Prophet Noah has been related.
text:
"Nuh" is the name of this Surah as well as the title of its subject matter, for in it, from beginning to the end, the story of the Prophet Noah has been related.

Period of Revelation

This also is one of the earliest Surahs to be revealed at Makkah, but the internal evidence of its subject matter shows that it was sent down in the period when opposition to the Holy Prophet's message of Islam by the disbelievers of Makkah had grown very strong and active.

Theme and Subject

In this surah the story of the Prophet Noah has not been related only for the sake of story telling, but its object is to warn the disbelievers of Makkah, so as to say:"You, O people of Makkah, are adopting towards Muhammad (upon whom be Allah's peace and blessings) the same attitude as the people of the Prophet Noah had adopted towards him; if you do not change this attitude, you too would meet with the same end." This had not been said in so many words anywhere in the Surah, but in the background of the conditions under which this story was narrated to the people of Makkah, this subject itself became obvious.

vv. 2-4 briefly explain how he began his mission and what he preached.

Then after suffering hardships and troubles in the way of preaching his mission for ages the report that he made to his Lord has been given in vv. 5-20. In it he states how he had been trying to bring his people to the right path and how his people had stubbornly opposed him.

After this, the Prophet Noah's final submission has been recorded in vv. 21-24, in which he prays to his Lord, saying: "These people have rejected my invitation: they are blindly following their chiefs, who have devised a tremendous plot of deceit and cunning. Time now has come when these people should be deprived of every grace to accept guidance." This was not an expression of impatience by the Prophet Noah, but when after having preached his message under extremely trying circumstances for centuries be became utterly disappointed with his people, he formed the opinion that no chance whatever was left of their coming to the right path. His this opinion fully conformed to Allah's own decision. Thus, in the next verse (25), it has been said: "The torment of Allah descended on those people because of their misdeeds."

In the concluding verse, the Prophet Noah's supplication that he made to his Lord, right at the time the torment descended, has been recorded. In it he prays for his own and for all the believers' forgiveness, and makes a submission to Allah to the effect: "Do not leave any of the disbelievers alive on the earth, for they have become utterly devoid of every good: they will not beget any but disbelieving and wicked descendants."

While studying this Surah one should keep in view the details of the Prophet Noah's story which have been given in the Qur'an above. For this see Al-Araf: 59-64, Yunus: 71-73, Hud: 25-49, Al-Mu'minun: 23-31, Ash- Shua'ra: 105-122, Al-Ankabut: 14-15, As-Saaffat: 75-82, Al-Qamar: 9-16.
description: That surah that opens with the story of the ancient Prophet Noah, the unrelenting Messenger of Resolve, and his obstinately unbelieving people. It is named after Noah (Nūḥ) whose account is related in the surah and further gives details of the life of Noah before the Flood, to encourage the Prophet and warn the disbelievers.

Efendi Nahi.verse 71:1: Ne e kemi dërguar Nuhun te populli i tij: “Paralajmëro popullin tënd para se t’i arrijë dënimi i dhembshëm!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:2: Ai tha: “O populli im, unë, me të vërtetë, jam për ju paralajmërues i qartë;
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:3: që t’i luteni Perëndisë dhe t’i ruheni (kundërshtimit) të Atij dhe që të më dëgjoni mua,
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:4: Ai ju falë mëkatet tuaja dhe do t’ju lërë të jetoni deri në çastin e caktuar, e kur t’ju vije çasti i caktuar i Perëndisë, me të vërtetë, ai nuk shtyhet; ta dini ju”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:5: Ai tha: “O Zoti im, unë, me te vërtetë, e thirra popullin tim natë e ditë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:6: por thirrja ime (nuk solli dobi, por) shkaktoi largim edhe më të madh.
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:7: E, sa herë që i thërrita (unë) ata (në punë të mbarë), për t’i falur Ti, ata i shtinin gishtërinjtë në veshët e tyre dhe mbuloheshin me petkat e tyre (për të mos më parë) – ishin këmbëngulës dhe shumë mendjemëdhenj.
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:8: Pastaj, i thirra haptazi (me zë edhe më të lartë),
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:9: e mandej ua shpalla publikisht atë, si dhe në besim u përshpërita (i thirra në të gjitha format).
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:10: Dhe ju thashë: Kërkoni falje nga Perëndia i jua, sepse, me të vërtetë, Ai është falës, i madh;
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:11: Ai do t’ju dërgojë juve shi të bollshëm,
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:12: dhe do t’ju ndihmojë me pasuri dhe me fëmijë, dhe për ju do të krijojë kopshtije dhe për ju do të krijojë lumenj.
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:13: Përse nuk i frikoheni madhërisë së Perëndisë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:14: e, Ai ju ka krijuar me forma (faza) të ndryshme?!
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:15: A nuk po shihni se si Perëndia i ka krijuar shtatë qiejt – palë-palë (kat-kat),
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:16: dhe në ta e ka bërë Hënën dritë, kurse Diellin e ka bërë fener (ndriçues)?
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:17: Perëndia ju ka krijuar nga toka (dheu), ashtu si bimët,
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:18: pastaj ju kthen te ajo dhe prej saj sërish do t’ju nxjerrë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:19: Perëndia për ju Tokën e ka bërë shtrojë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:20: që të ecni nëpër të, nëpër rrugët e gjera?”
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:21: Nuhu tha: “O Zoti im, ata më kundërshtuan mua dhe u dhanë pas atyre, pasuria dhe fëmijët e të cilëve nuk kanë sjellë gjë tjetër, pos shkatërrimt,
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:22: dhe trilluan trillime të mëdha (kundër Nuhut)
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:23: dhe kanë thënë (populli i Nuhut): Mos i lini kurrsesi zotrat tuaja, mos e lini kurrsesi as Veddin, as Suvain, as Jeguthin, as Jeukin, as Nesrin’!
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:24: E, këta idhujë kanë mashtruar shumë (njerëz); e ti (keqbërësve), mos u smadho asgjë, përpos humbjes!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:25: Për shkak të mëkateve të tyre, ata janë përmbytur, e janë hedhur në zjarr dhe ata nuk kanë gjetur mbrojtës tjetër për vete, përveç Perëndisë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:26: Dhe Nuhu tha: “O Zoti im, mos lë të qarkullojë në faqe të dheut asnjë mohues,
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:27: sepse, me të vërtetë, nëse Ti i lë, ata – do t’i shpien në humbje robërit e Tu dhe do tëlindin vetëm mëkatarë dhe jobesimtarë!
Efendi Nahi.verse 71:28: O Zoti im, falmë mua dhe prindërit e mi, dhe ata të cilët hynë në shtëpinë time si besimtarë, dhe besimtarët e besimtaret, ndërsa zullumqarëve shtoju vetëm shkatërrimin! jobesimtarë!

null.verse 71:1: Həqiqətən, Biz Nuhu: "Qövmünə şiddətli bir əzab gəlməmişdən əvəl onları (Allahın əzabı ilə) qorxut!" - deyə öz tayfasına peyğəmbər göndərdik.
null.verse 71:2: O dedi: "Ey qövmüm! Həqiqətən, mən sizi (Allahın əzabı ilə) açıq-aşkar qorxudan bir peyğəmbərəm!
null.verse 71:3: Allaha ibadət edin, Ondan qorxun və mənə də itaət edin!
null.verse 71:4: (Əgər belə etsəniz) O sizin günahlarınızdan keçər, sizə müəyyən vaxtadək (əcəliniz çatana qədər) möhlət verər (cəzanızı dünyada verməyib axirətə saxlayar).
null.verse 71:5: O dedi: "Ey Rəbbim! Mən qövmümü gecə-gündüz (imana, haqq yola) də'vət etdim!
null.verse 71:6: Lakin də'vətim onların (imandan) qaçmalarını daha da artırmaqdan başqa bir şeyə yaramadı.
null.verse 71:7: Sənin onları bağışlamağın üçün mən nə zaman onları (imana) də'vət etdimsə, onlar (də'vətimi eşitməsinlər deyə) barmaqlarını qularlarına tıxadılar, (məni görməsinlər deyə) libaslarına büründülər, (küfrlərində) israr edib durdular və təkəbbür göstərdilər.
null.verse 71:8: Sonra mən onları uca səslə (açıq-açığına haqqa) də'vət etdim.
null.verse 71:9: Daha sonra onlara (iman gətirmək lazım olduğunu) aşkar söylədim və gizli bildirdim".
null.verse 71:10: Və dedim: "(Tövbə edib) Rəbbinizdən bağışlanmağınızı diləyin.
null.verse 71:11: O sizə göydən bol yağış göndərər;
null.verse 71:12: O sizə mal-dövlət, oğul-uşaq əta edər.
null.verse 71:13: Sizə nə olub ki, Allahın əzəmətindən çəkinmirsiniz? (Sizə nə olub ki, Allahın əzəmət və qüdrətindən qorxmur, Onu layiqincə uca tutmursunuz? Yaxud iman gətirəcəyiniz təqdirdə Allahın axirətdə sizə mərhəmət əta edəcəyinə ümid bəsləmirsiniz?)
null.verse 71:14: Halbuki O sizi cürbəcür (və ya müxtəlif mərhələlərlə - əvvəl nütfə, sonra laxtalanmış qan, sonra bir parça ət və, nəhayət, insan şəklində) xəlq etdi.
null.verse 71:15: Məgər görmürsünüz ki, Allah yeddi göyü (bir-birinin üstündə) qat-qat necə yaratdı?!
null.verse 71:16: Orada ayı bir nur, günəşi də bir çıraq etdi.
null.verse 71:17: Və Allah sizi (atanız Adəmi) yerdən (torpaqdan) bir bitki kimi göyərtdi.
null.verse 71:18: Sonra sizi yenə ora qaytaracaq və (qiyamət günü dirildib oradan da) çıxardacaqdır.
null.verse 71:19: Allah yeri sizin üçün xalı etdi (fərş kimi ayaqlarınızın altına döşədi) ki,
null.verse 71:20: Onun geniş yollarında gəzəsiniz!"
null.verse 71:21: Nuh dedi: "Ey Rəbbim! Onlar mənə qarşı çıxdılar və mal-dövləti, oğul-uşağı özlərinə ziyandan başqa bir şey artırmayan kimsələrə (öz kafir başçılarına) tabe oldular.
null.verse 71:22: (Onların kafir başçıları mənim əleyhimə) çox böyük bir hiylə qurdular.
null.verse 71:23: Və (tabeçiliyində olanlara) dedilər: "?z tanrılarınızı tərk etməyin, (xüsusilə) Bəddi, Suva'ı, Yəğusu, Yəuqu və Nəsri atmayın!"
null.verse 71:24: Onlar çoxlarını yoldan çıxartdılar.
null.verse 71:25: Onlar öz günahlarından dolayı suda boğdurulub Cəhənnəmə daxil edildilər və özlərinə onları Allahdan (Allahın əzabından) qurtaracaq köməkçilər də tapa bilmədilər!
null.verse 71:26: Nuh dedi: "Ey Rəbbim! Yer üzündə bir nəfər belə kafir qoyma!
null.verse 71:27: Cünki sən onları (sağ) buraxsan, onlar Sənin bəndələrini yoldan çıxardacaq, ancaq pozğun və kafir (oğul-uşaq) doğub-törədəcəklər.
null.verse 71:28: Ey Rəbbim! Məni, ata-anamı, mənim evimə (yaxud məscidimə) mö'min kimi daxil olan kimsəni və (qiyamət gününə qədər olacaq) bütün mö'min kişiləri və qadınları bağışla.

null.verse 71:1: Mi smo poslali Nuha narodu njegovu: "Opominji narod svoj prije nego što ga stigne patnja nesnosna!"
null.verse 71:2: O narode moj, - govorio je on - "ja vas otvoreno opominjem:
null.verse 71:3: Allahu se klanjajte i Njega se bojte i meni poslušni budite,
null.verse 71:4: On će vam grijehe vaše oprostiti i u životu vas do određenog časa ostaviti, a kada Allahov određeni čas dođe zaista se neće, neka znate, odgoditi.
null.verse 71:5: On reče: "Gospodaru moj, ja sam narod svoj i noću i danju, doista, pozivao,
null.verse 71:6: ali ga je pozivanje moje još više udaljilo.
null.verse 71:7: I kad god sam ih pozivao da im oprostiš, prste su svoje u uši stavljali i haljinama svojim se pokrivali - bili su uporni i pretjerano oholi.
null.verse 71:8: Zatim, ja sam ih otvoreno pozivao,
null.verse 71:9: a onda sam im javno objavljivao i u povjerenju im šaputao,
null.verse 71:10: i govorio: ’Tražite od Gospodara svoga oprost jer On, doista, mnogo prašta;
null.verse 71:11: On će vam kišu obilnu slati
null.verse 71:12: i pomoći će vas imanjima i sinovima, i daće vam bašče, i rijeke će vam dati.
null.verse 71:13: Šta vam je, zašto se Allahove sile ne bojite,
null.verse 71:14: a On vas postepeno stvara?!
null.verse 71:15: Zar ne vidite kako je Allah sedam nebesa, jedno iznad drugog, stvorio,
null.verse 71:16: i na njima Mjesec svjetlim dao, a Sunce svjetiljkom učinio?
null.verse 71:17: Allah vas od zemlje poput bilja stvara,
null.verse 71:18: zatim vas u nju vraća i iz nje će vas, sigurno, izvesti.
null.verse 71:19: Allah vam je zemlju učinio ravnom,
null.verse 71:20: da biste po njoj hodili putevima prostranim?’”
null.verse 71:21: Nuh reče: "Gospodaru moj, oni mene ne slušaju i povode se za onima čija bogatstva i djeca samo njihovu propast uvećavaju
null.verse 71:22: i spletke velike snuju
null.verse 71:23: i govore: ’Nikako božanstva svoja ne ostavljajte, i nikako ni Vedda, ni Suvaa, a ni Jegusa, ni Jeuka, ni Jesra ne napuštajte!’,
null.verse 71:24: a već su mnoge u zabludu doveli, pa Ti njima, inadžijama, samo propast povećaj!"
null.verse 71:25: I oni su zbog grijehova svojih potopljeni i u vatru će biti uvedeni i nikoga sebi, osim Allaha, kao pomagača neće naći.
null.verse 71:26: I Nuh reče: "Gospodaru moj, ne ostavi na Zemlji nijednog nevjernika,
null.verse 71:27: jer, ako ih ostaviš, oni će robove Tvoje u zabludu zavoditi i samo će grješnika i nevjernika rađati!
null.verse 71:28: Gospodaru moj, oprosti meni, i roditeljima mojim, i onome koji kao vjernik u dom moj uđe, i vjernicima i vjernicama, a nevjernicima samo propast povećaj!" rađati!

null.verse 71:1: আমি নূহকে প্রেরণ করেছিলাম তাঁর সম্প্রদায়ের প্রতি একথা বলেঃ তুমি তোমার সম্প্রদায়কে সতর্ক কর, তাদের প্রতি মর্মন্তদ শাস্তি আসার আগে।
null.verse 71:2: সে বলল, হে আমার সম্প্রদায়! আমি তোমাদের জন্যে স্পষ্ট সতর্ককারী।
null.verse 71:3: এ বিষয়ে যে, তোমরা আল্লাহ তা’আলার এবাদত কর, তাঁকে ভয় কর এবং আমার আনুগত্য কর।
null.verse 71:4: আল্লাহ তা’আলা তোমাদের পাপসমূহ ক্ষমা করবেন এবং নির্দিষ্ট সময় পর্যন্ত অবকাশ দিবেন। নিশ্চয় আল্লাহ তা’আলার নির্দিষ্টকাল যখন হবে, তখন অবকাশ দেয়া হবে না, যদি তোমরা তা জানতে!
null.verse 71:5: সে বললঃ হে আমার পালনকর্তা! আমি আমার সম্প্রদায়কে দিবারাত্রি দাওয়াত দিয়েছি;
null.verse 71:6: কিন্তু আমার দাওয়াত তাদের পলায়নকেই বৃদ্ধি করেছে।
null.verse 71:7: আমি যতবারই তাদেরকে দাওয়াত দিয়েছি, যাতে আপনি তাদেরকে ক্ষমা করেন, ততবারই তারা কানে অঙ্গুলি দিয়েছে, মুখমন্ডল বস্ত্রাবৃত করেছে, জেদ করেছে এবং খুব ঔদ্ধত্য প্রদর্শন করেছে।
null.verse 71:8: অতঃপর আমি তাদেরকে প্রকাশ্যে দাওয়াত দিয়েছি,
null.verse 71:9: অতঃপর আমি ঘোষণা সহকারে প্রচার করেছি এবং গোপনে চুপিসারে বলেছি।
null.verse 71:10: অতঃপর বলেছিঃ তোমরা তোমাদের পালনকর্তার ক্ষমা প্রার্থনা কর। তিনি অত্যন্ত ক্ষমাশীল।
null.verse 71:11: তিনি তোমাদের উপর অজস্র বৃষ্টিধারা ছেড়ে দিবেন,
null.verse 71:12: তোমাদের ধন-সম্পদ ও সন্তান-সন্ততি বাড়িয়ে দিবেন, তোমাদের জন্যে উদ্যান স্থাপন করবেন এবং তোমাদের জন্যে নদীনালা প্রবাহিত করবেন।
null.verse 71:13: তোমাদের কি হল যে, তোমরা আল্লাহ তা’আলার শ্রেষ্টত্ব আশা করছ না।
null.verse 71:14: অথচ তিনি তোমাদেরকে বিভিন্ন রকমে সৃষ্টি করেছেন।
null.verse 71:15: তোমরা কি লক্ষ্য কর না যে, আল্লাহ কিভাবে সপ্ত আকাশ স্তরে স্তরে সৃষ্টি করেছেন।
null.verse 71:16: এবং সেখানে চন্দ্রকে রেখেছেন আলোরূপে এবং সূর্যকে রেখেছেন প্রদীপরূপে।
null.verse 71:17: আল্লাহ তা’আলা তোমাদেরকে মৃত্তিকা থেকে উদগত করেছেন।
null.verse 71:18: অতঃপর তাতে ফিরিয়ে নিবেন এবং আবার পুনরুত্থিত করবেন।
null.verse 71:19: আল্লাহ তা’আলা তোমাদের জন্যে ভূমিকে করেছেন বিছানা।
null.verse 71:20: যাতে তোমরা চলাফেরা কর প্রশস্ত পথে।
null.verse 71:21: নূহ বললঃ হে আমার পালনকর্তা, আমার সম্প্রদায় আমাকে অমান্য করেছে আর অনুসরণ করছে এমন লোককে, যার ধন-সম্পদ ও সন্তান-সন্ততি কেবল তার ক্ষতিই বৃদ্ধি করছে।
null.verse 71:22: আর তারা ভয়ানক চক্রান্ত করছে।
null.verse 71:23: তারা বলছেঃ তোমরা তোমাদের উপাস্যদেরকে ত্যাগ করো না এবং ত্যাগ করো না ওয়াদ, সূয়া, ইয়াগুছ, ইয়াউক ও নসরকে।
null.verse 71:24: অথচ তারা অনেককে পথভ্রষ্ট করেছে। অতএব আপনি জালেমদের পথভ্রষ্টতাই বাড়িয়ে দিন।
null.verse 71:25: তাদের গোনাহসমূহের দরুন তাদেরকে নিমজ্জিত করা হয়েছে, অতঃপর দাখিল করা হয়েছে জাহান্নামে। অতঃপর তারা আল্লাহ তা’আলা ব্যতীত কাউকে সাহায্যকারী পায়নি।
null.verse 71:26: নূহ আরও বললঃ হে আমার পালনকর্তা, আপনি পৃথিবীতে কোন কাফের গৃহবাসীকে রেহাই দিবেন না।
null.verse 71:27: যদি আপনি তাদেরকে রেহাই দেন, তবে তারা আপনার বান্দাদেরকে পথভ্রষ্ট করবে এবং জন্ম দিতে থাকবে কেবল পাপাচারী, কাফের।
null.verse 71:28: হে আমার পালনকর্তা! আপনি আমাকে, আমার পিতা-মাতাকে, যারা মুমিন হয়ে আমার গৃহে প্রবেশ করে-তাদেরকে এবং মুমিন পুরুষ ও মুমিন নারীদেরকে ক্ষমা করুন এবং যালেমদের কেবল ধ্বংসই বৃদ্ধি করুন। কাফের।

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:1: Ние изпратихме Нух при неговия народ: Предупреди народа си, докато не го е сполетяло болезнено мъчение!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:2: Рече: О, народе мой, аз съм явен предупредител за вас.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:3: Служете на Аллах и се бойте от Него, и ми се покорете!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:4: Тогава Той ще ви опрости греховете и ще ви даде отсрочка за определено време.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:5: Рече: Господи мой, зовях народа си нощем и денем,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:6: но зовът ми само увеличи тяхното бягство.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:7: И всякога, щом ги зовях, за да ги опростиш, запушваха с пръсти ушите си и се загръщаха в дрехите си, и упорстваха, и все повече се възгордяваха.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:9: после им прогласявах явно и им шепнех тайно.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:10: И казвах: Молете вашия Господ за опрощение - Той е многоопрощаващ,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:11: за да ви праща обилен дъжд от небето,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:12: и да ви подкрепя с имоти и синове, и да сторва за вас градини, и да сторва за вас реки.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:13: Какво ви е, защо не зачитате величието на Аллах?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:15: Нима не виждате как Аллах сътвори седем небеса на слоеве?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:16: И стори Той там от луната сияние, и стори от слънцето светилник.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:17: И ви създаде [от пръст] от земята да израснете.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:18: После ще ви върне в нея и отново ще ви извади [в Съдния ден].
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:19: Аллах стори за вас от земята постеля,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:20: за да ходите там по широки пътища.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:21: Рече Нух: Господи мой, те ми се възпротивиха и последваха онези, чиито имоти и деца само увеличиха тяхната загуба.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:22: И лукавстваха те с огромно лукавство.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:23: И казваха: Никога не изоставяйте своите божества, не изоставяйте нито Уад, нито Суаа, нито Ягус и Яук, и Наср!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:25: Заради своите грехове те бяха издавени и въведени в Огъня, и не намериха за себе си други помощници вместо Аллах.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:26: И рече Нух: Господи мой, не оставяй по земята нито един неверник!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:27: Оставиш ли ги, те ще заблудят Твоите раби и ще родят само нечестивци, неблагодарници.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 71:28: Господи мой, опрости на мен и на родителите ми, и на всеки вярващ, който влезе в моя дом, и на вярващите мъже, и на вярващите жени, и надбавяй на угнетителите само гибел! неблагодарници.

null.verse 71:1: 我確已派譴努哈去教化他的宗族，我說：「在痛苦的刑罰降臨你的宗族之前，你當警告他們。」
null.verse 71:2: 他說：「我的宗族啊！我確是你們的坦率的警告者，
null.verse 71:3: 你們應當崇拜真主，應當敬畏他，應當服從我，
null.verse 71:4: 他就赦宥你們的罪過，並且讓你們延遲到一個定期。真主的定期一旦來臨的時候，是絕不延遲的，假若你們知道。」
null.verse 71:5: 他說：「我的主啊！我確已日夜召喚我的宗族，
null.verse 71:6: 但我的召喚使他們愈加逃避。
null.verse 71:7: 我每次召喚他們來受你的赦宥的時候，他們總是以指頭塞住他們的耳朵，以衣服蒙住他們的頭，他們固執而自大。
null.verse 71:8: 然後我大聲召喚他們，
null.verse 71:9: 然後我公開地訓導他們，秘密地勸諫他們，
null.verse 71:10: 我說，你們應當向你們的主求饒——他確是至赦的——
null.verse 71:11: 他就使豐足的雨水降臨你們，
null.verse 71:12: 並且以財產和子嗣援助你們，為你們創造園圃和河流。
null.verse 71:13: 你們怎麼不希望真主的尊重呢？
null.verse 71:14: 他確已經過幾個階段創造了你們。
null.verse 71:15: 難道你們沒有看到真主怎樣創造七層天，
null.verse 71:16: 並以月亮為光明，以太陽為明燈嗎？
null.verse 71:17: 真主使你們從大地生長出來，
null.verse 71:18: 然後使你們再返於大地，然後，又把你們從大地取出來。
null.verse 71:19: 真主為你們而平展大地，
null.verse 71:20: 以便你們在大地上走著寬闊的道路。」
null.verse 71:21: 努哈說：「我的主啊！他們確已違抗我，他們順從那因財產和子嗣而更加虧折的人們，
null.verse 71:22: 那等人曾定了一個重大的計謀，
null.verse 71:23: 他們說：『你們絕不要放棄你們的眾神明，你們絕不要放棄旺德、素佤爾、葉巫斯、葉歐格、奈斯爾。』
null.verse 71:24: 他們確已使許多人迷誤，求你使不義的人們更加迷誤。」
null.verse 71:25: 他們因為自己的罪惡而被淹死，遂墮入火獄，故他們沒有獲得援助的人們來抵禦真主。
null.verse 71:26: 努哈說：「我的主啊！求你不要留一個不信道大者在大地上，
null.verse 71:27: 如果你留他們，他們將使你的眾僕迷誤，他們只生育不道德的、不感恩的子女。
null.verse 71:28: 我的主啊！求你赦宥我和我的父母，赦宥信道而入我的房屋的人，以及信士們和信女們。求你使不義的人們更加毀滅。」 如果你留他們，他們將使你的眾僕迷誤，他們只生育不道德的、不感恩的子女。

null.verse 71:1: Věru jsme poslali Noema k lidu jeho s rozkazem: "Varuj lid svůj, dříve než postihne jej trest bolestný!"
null.verse 71:2: I pravil Noe: "Lide můj, jsem vyslán k vám jako varovatel zjevný,
null.verse 71:3: abyste Boha uctívali, bohabojní byli a mne poslouchali!
null.verse 71:4: On odpustí vám vaše viny a dá vám odklad až do lhůty určené.
null.verse 71:5: A zvolal: "Pane můj, vyzýval jsem lid svůj nocí i dnem,
null.verse 71:6: mé kázání však rozmnožilo jejich odpor jen.
null.verse 71:7: A kdykoliv jsem je vyzýval - abys jim mohl odpustit - tu prsty si do uší strkali, do šatů svých se halili, zatvrdili se a chovali se hrdopyšně.
null.verse 71:8: Potom jsem jim kázal zcela veřejně,
null.verse 71:9: pak jsem vystoupil otevřeně a jednal s nimi skrytě i tajně
null.verse 71:10: a pravil jsem jim:, Proste Pána svého za odpuštění, vždyť On věru je odpouštějící!
null.verse 71:11: On sešle na vás nebe deštěm hojným
null.verse 71:12: a rozmnoží vám majetky i syny a připraví pro vás zahrady a řeky.
null.verse 71:13: Co je vám, že nedoufáte ve velkomyslnost Boží?
null.verse 71:14: On přece stvořil vás v postupných formách;
null.verse 71:15: což nevidíte, jak Bůh stvořil sedm nebes ve vrstvách
null.verse 71:16: a umístil mezi nimi měsíc jako světlo a slunce učinil pochodní?
null.verse 71:17: Bůh dal vám vyrůst ze země jako rostlinám,
null.verse 71:18: potom vás do ní vrátí a posléze vás z ní vyvede znenadání.
null.verse 71:19: A Bůh zemi jako koberce rozprostřel vám,
null.verse 71:20: abyste cestami širokými chodili po ní.
null.verse 71:21: I pravil Noe dále: Pane můj, oni mne neuposlechli a následovali toho, jehož majetek a děti jen zkázu jeho zvětšily,
null.verse 71:22: a nesmírný úklad proti mně připravili
null.verse 71:23: a zvolali:, Neopouštějte božstva svá! Neopouštějte Wadda ani Suwá´, ani Jaghútha a Ja´úqa a Nasra!?
null.verse 71:24: A věru oni mnohým zbloudit dali; a nerozmnožuj nespravedlivým ničeho, leda jejich bloudění!"
null.verse 71:25: Pro hříchy své pak byli utopeni a do ohně pekelného vrženi a nenalezli pro sebe mimo Boha žádné pomocníky.
null.verse 71:26: A pravil Noe: "Pane můj, neponechávej na zemi žádného obyvatele z nevěřících,
null.verse 71:27: vždyť ponecháš-li je, oni dají zbloudit služebníkům Tvým a nezrodí nic, než zase zarputilé nevěřící a hříšníky.
null.verse 71:28: Pane můj, odpusť mi a rodičům mým i těm, kdož jako věřící do mého domu vstoupili, a také věřícím mužům a ženám! A nerozmnožuj nespravedlivým nic, leda záhubu jejich!" hříšníky.

null.verse 71:1: Wij zonden Noach tot zijn volk, "Waarschuw uw volk voordat een smartelijke straf over hen komt.
null.verse 71:2: Noach zei: "O mijn volk! Waarlijk ik ben een duidelijke waarschuwer voor u.
null.verse 71:3: Aanbidt daarom God, vreest Hem en gehoorzaamt mij.
null.verse 71:4: Hij zal u uw zonden vergeven en u uitstel verlenen tot een bepaalde termijn; voorwaar, de termijn van God kan, wanneer hij komt, niet worden uitgesteld, als gij dit slechts wist!"
null.verse 71:5: Hij zeide: "Mijn Heer, ik heb mijn volk dag en nacht geroepen,
null.verse 71:6: Maar mijn roepen heeft slechts hun afkeer vermeerderd.
null.verse 71:7: En telkens wanneer ik hen riep, opdat Gij hen zoudt vergeven stopten zij hun vingers in de oren, bedekten zich met hun kleren, volhardden (in hun ongeloof) en gedroegen zich laatdunkend.
null.verse 71:8: Toen riep ik hen luide,
null.verse 71:9: En verkondigde hun in het openbaar; ook sprak ik tot hen in het verborgene.
null.verse 71:10: En ik zeide: "Zoekt vergiffenis van uw Heer, want Hij is de Vergevensgezinde.
null.verse 71:11: Hij zal regen voor u nederzenden in overvloed.
null.verse 71:12: En Hij zal uw rijkdommen en kinderen vermeerderen, en Hij zal u tuinen en rivieren schenken.
null.verse 71:13: Wat scheelt u, dat gij geen Wijsheid van God verwacht?
null.verse 71:14: En Hij heeft u door verschillende stadia heen geschapen.
null.verse 71:15: "Hebt gij niet gezien, hoe God de zeven opeenvolgende hemelen schiep?
null.verse 71:16: En hoe Hij de maan daarin als licht heeft geplaatst en de zon als een stralende lamp!
null.verse 71:17: En God heeft u voortgebracht vanuit de aarde.
null.verse 71:18: Vervolgens zal Hij u daarheen doen terugkeren, en u daaruit opnieuw doen verrijzen.
null.verse 71:19: En God heeft de aarde voor u uitgespreid
null.verse 71:20: Zodat gij de brede wegen er van doorkruist.
null.verse 71:21: Noach zeide: "Mijn Heer, zij gehoorzamen mij niet, en volgen iemand wiens bezit en kinderen slechts tot zijn ondergang hebben bijgedragen.
null.verse 71:22: En zij hebben een vreselijk plan gesmeed.
null.verse 71:23: En zeggen tegen elkander: ’Verlaat uw goden nooit.
null.verse 71:24: En zij hebben velen doen dwalen, en Gij doet de onrechtvaardigen slechts in dwaling toenemen.
null.verse 71:25: Daarom werden zij vanwege hun zonden verdronken en in het Vuur gedreven.
null.verse 71:26: En Noach had gezegd: "Mijn Heer, laat in het land geen huis der ongelovigen achterblijven;
null.verse 71:27: Want als Gij hen achterlaat zullen zij Uw dienaren op een dwaalspoor leiden en zij zullen niets dan een onzedelijk en ondankbaar nageslacht voortbrengen.
null.verse 71:28: Mijn Heer, vergeef mij, en mijn ouders, en hem die gelovend mijn huis binnentreedt, ook de gelovige mannen en vrouwen; en doe de onrechtvaardigen slechts in verderf toenemen.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:1: Lo! We sent Noah unto his people (saying): Warn thy people ere the painful doom come unto them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:2: He said: O my people! Lo! I am a plain warner unto you
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:3: (Bidding you): Serve Allah and keep your duty unto Him and obey me,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:4: That He may forgive you somewhat of your sins and respite you to an appointed term.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:5: He said: My Lord! Lo! I have called unto my people night and day
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:6: But all my calling doth but add to their repugnance;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:7: And lo! whenever I call unto them that Thou mayst pardon them they thrust their fingers in their ears and cover themselves with their garments and persist (in their refusal) and magnify themselves in pride.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:8: And lo! I have called unto them aloud,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:9: And lo! I have made public proclamation unto them, and I have appealed to them in private.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:10: And I have said: Seek pardon of your Lord.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:11: He will let loose the sky for you in plenteous rain,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:12: And will help you with wealth and sons, and will assign unto you Gardens and will assign unto you rivers.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:13: What aileth you that ye hope not toward Allah for dignity
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:14: When He created you by (divers) stages ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:15: See ye not how Allah hath created seven heavens in harmony,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:16: And hath made the moon a light therein, and made the sun a lamp ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:17: And Allah hath caused you to grow as a growth from the earth,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:18: And afterward He maketh you return thereto, and He will bring you forth again, a (new) forthbringing.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:19: And Allah hath made the earth a wide expanse for you
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:20: That ye may thread the valley-ways thereof.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:21: Noah said: My Lord! Lo! they have disobeyed me and followed one whose wealth and children increase him in naught save ruin;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:22: And they have plotted a mighty plot,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:23: And they have said: Forsake not your gods.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:24: And they have led many astray, and Thou increasest the wrong-doers in naught save error.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:25: Because of their sins they were drowned, then made to enter a Fire.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:26: And Noah said: My Lord! Leave not one of the disbelievers in the land.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:27: If Thou shouldst leave them, they will mislead Thy slaves and will beget none save lewd ingrates.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 71:28: My Lord! Forgive me and my parents and him who entereth my house believing, and believing men and believing women, and increase not the wrong-doers in aught save ruin.

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:1: We sent Noah to his People (with the Command): "Do thou warn thy People before there comes to them a grievous Penalty.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:2: He said: "O my People! I am to you a Warner, clear and open:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:3: "That ye should worship God, fear Him and obey me:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:4: "So He may forgive you your sins and give you respite for a stated Term: for when the Term given by God is accomplished, it cannot be put forward: if ye only knew.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:5: He said: "O my Lord! I have called to my People night and day:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:6: "But my call only increases (their) flight (from the Right).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:7: "And every time I have called to them, that Thou mightest forgive them, they have (only) thrust their fingers into their ears, covered themselves up with their garments, grown obstinate, and given themselves up to arrogance.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:8: "So I have called to them aloud;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:9: "Further I have spoken to them in public and secretly in private,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:10: "Saying, ’Ask forgiveness from your Lord; for He is Oft-Forgiving;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:11: "’He will send rain to you in abundance;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:12: "’Give you increase in wealth and sons; and bestow on you gardens and bestow on you rivers (of flowing water).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:13: "’What is the matter with you, that ye place not your hope for kindness and long-suffering in God,-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:14: "’Seeing that it is He that has created you in diverse stages?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:15: "’See ye not how God has created the seven heavens one above another,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:16: "’And made the moon a light in their midst, and made the sun as a (Glorious) Lamp?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:17: "’And God has produced you from the earth growing (gradually),
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:18: "’And in the End He will return you into the (earth), and raise you forth (again at the Resurrection)?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:19: "’And God has made the earth for you as a carpet (spread out),
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:20: "’That ye may go about therein, in spacious roads.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:21: Noah said: "O my Lord! They have disobeyed me, but they follow (men) whose wealth and children give them no increase but only Loss.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:22: "And they have devised a tremendous Plot.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:23: "And they have said (to each other), ’Abandon not your gods: Abandon neither Wadd nor Suwa’, neither Yaguth nor Ya’uq, nor Nasr’;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:24: "They have already misled many; and grant Thou no increase to the wrong-doers but in straying (from their mark).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:25: Because of their sins they were drowned (in the flood), and were made to enter the Fire (of Punishment): and they found- in lieu of God- none to help them.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:26: And Noah, said: "O my Lord! Leave not of the Unbelievers, a single one on earth!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:27: "For, if Thou dost leave (any of) them, they will but mislead Thy devotees, and they will breed none but wicked ungrateful ones.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 71:28: "O my Lord! Forgive me, my parents, all who enter my house in Faith, and (all) believing men and believing women: and to the wrong-doers grant Thou no increase but in perdition!"

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:1: We sent Noah to his people, saying, ’Warn thy people, ere there come on them a painful chastisement.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:2: He said, ’O my people, I am unto you a clear warner,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:3: saying, "Serve God, and fear Him, and obey you me,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:4: nd He will forgive you your sins, and defer you to a stated term; God’s term, when it comes, cannot be deferred, did you but know.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:5: He said; ’My Lord, I have called my people by night and by day,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:6: but my calling has only increased them in flight.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:7: And whenever I called them, that Thou mightest forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, and wrapped them in their garments, and persisted, and waxed very proud.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:8: Then indeed I called them openly;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:9: then indeed I spoke publicly unto them, and I spoke unto them secretly,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:10: and I said, "Ask you forgiveness of your Lord; surely He is ever All-forgiving,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:11: and He will loose heaven upon you in torrents
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:12: and will succour you with wealth and sons, and will appoint for you gardens, and will appoint for you rivers.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:13: What ails you, that you look not for majesty in God,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:14: seeing He created you by stages?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:15: Have you not regarded how God created seven heavens one upon another,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:16: and set the moon therein for a light and the sun for a lamp?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:17: And God caused you to grow out of the earth,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:18: then He shall return you into it, and bring you forth.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:19: And God has laid the earth for you as a carpet,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:20: that thereof you may thread ways, ravines.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:21: Noah said, ’My Lord, they have rebelled against me, and followed him whose wealth and children increase him only in loss,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:22: and have devised a mighty device
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:23: and have said, "Do not leave your gods, and do not leave Wadd, nor Suwa’, Yaghuth, Ya’uq, neither Nasr.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:24: And they have led many astray.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:25: And because of their transgressions they were drowned, and admitted into a Fire, for they found not, apart from God, any to help them.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:26: And Noah said, ’My Lord, leave not upon the earth of the unbelievers even one.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:27: Surely, if Thou leavest them, they will lead Thy servants astray, and will beget none but unbelieving libertines.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 71:28: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whosoever enters my house as a believer, and the believers, men and women alike; and do Thou not increase the evildoers save in ruin!’ libertines.

Muhammad Asad.verse 71:1: BEHOLD, We sent Noah unto his people,
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:2: "Warn thy people ere grievous suffering befall them!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:3: [And Noah] said: "O my people! I am but a plain warner to you, [sent to tell you]
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:6: so that He may forgive you some of your sins, and grant you respite until a term known [to Him alone]: but, behold, when the term appointed by God does come, it can never be put back – if you but knew it!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:7: [And after a time, Noah] said: "O my Sustainer! Verily, I have been calling unto my people night and day,
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:8: but my call has only caused them to flee farther and farther away [from Thee].
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:9: And, behold, whenever I called unto them with a view to Thy granting them forgiveness, they put their fingers into their ears, and wrapped themselves up in their garments [of sin], and grew obstinate, and became [yet more] arrogant in their false pride.
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:10: "And, behold, I called unto them openly;
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:11: and, behold, I preached to them in public; and I spoke to them secretly, in private;
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:12: and I said: "‘Ask your Sustainer to forgive you your sins – for, verily, He is all-forgiving!
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:13: He will shower upon you heavenly blessings abundant,
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:14: and will aid you with worldly goods and children, and will bestow upon you gardens, and bestow upon you running waters.
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:15: "What is amiss with you that you cannot look forward to God’s majesty,
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:16: seeing that He has created [every one of] you in successive stages?
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:17: "Do you not see how God has created seven heavens in full harmony with one another,
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:18: and has set up within them the moon as a light ,
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:19: and set up the sun as a
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:21: "And God has caused you to grow out of the earth in
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:22: growth; and thereafter He will return you to it [in death]:
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:24: He will bring you forth [from it] in resurrection.
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:25: "And God has made the earth a wide expanse for you,
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:26: so that you might walk thereon on spacious paths.
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:28: Noah continued: "O my Sustainer! Behold, they have opposed me ,
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:29: for they follow people whose wealth and children lead them increasingly into ruin,
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:30: and who have devised a most awesome blasphemy [against Thee],
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:31: inasmuch as they said [to their followers], ‘Do not ever abandon your gods: abandon neither Wadd nor Suwa’, and neither Yaghūth nor Ya’ūq nor Nasr!’
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:32: "And so they have led many a one astray: hence, ordain Thou that these evildoers stray but farther and farther away [from all that they may desire]!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:33: And so, because of their sins, they were drowned [in the great flood], and were doomed to suffer the fire [of the hereafter]; and they found none who could succour them against God.
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:34: And Noah prayed: "O my Sustainer! Leave not on earth any of those who deny the truth:
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:35: for, behold, if Thou dost leave them, they will [always try to] lead astray those who worship Thee, and will give birth to nothing but wickedness and stubborn ingratitude.
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:36: "O my Sustainer! Grant Thy forgiveness unto me and unto my parents, and unto everyone who enters my house as a believer, and unto all believing men and believing women [of later times]; and grant Thou that the doers of evil shall increasingly meet with destruction!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 71:37: (nūr); both these interpolations are explained in note 10 on 10:5.

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:1: We sent NūH to his people (and said to him): “Warn your people before a painful punishment comes to them.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:2: He said, “O my people, I openly warn you
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:3: that you must worship Allah, and fear Him, and obey me,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:4: and Allah will forgive you your sins, and will respite you to an appointed term.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:5: He said, “My Lord, I have called my people night and day,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:6: but my call added only to their flight (from the truth).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:7: Whenever I called them, so that You might forgive them, they put their fingers into their ears, and wrapped their clothes around themselves, and grew obstinate, and waxed proud in extreme arrogance.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:9: and then I spoke to them in public and spoke to them in private.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:10: So I said, ‘Pray to your Lord for your forgiveness,- Indeed He is Very-Forgiving, -
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:11: and He will cause the heavens to rain upon you in abundance,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:12: and will help you with riches and sons, and will cause gardens to grow for you, and cause rivers to flow for you.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:13: What has happened to you that you do not appreciate the Majesty of Allah,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:14: while He has created you in different phases?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:15: Did you not see how Allah has created seven heavens one upon another,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:16: and has made the moon a light therein, and made the sun a lamp?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:17: And Allah has caused you to grow well out of the earth,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:18: then He will send you back into it, and will bring you forth once again.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:19: And Allah has made the earth a spread for you,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:20: so that you may go about its broad ways.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:21: And said NūH, “My Lord, they disobeyed me, and followed him whose wealth and children added nothing to him but loss,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:22: and they devised a mighty plot,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:23: and said (to their people), “Never forsake your gods, and never forsake Wadd, nor Suwā‘, nor Yaghūth and Ya‘ūq and Nasr.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:24: And they have led many astray.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:25: Because of their sins they were drowned, and then admitted into the Fire.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:26: And said NūH, “My Lord, do not leave on earth even a single inhabitant (surviving) out of the disbelievers.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:27: If You leave them (surviving), they will lead Your servants astray, and will beget none but a sinful disbeliever.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 71:28: My Lord, grant pardon to me, and to my parents, and to everyone who enters my home as a believer, and to all the believing men and believing women, and do not increase the wrongdoers but in ruin.

Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:1: Verily We sent Noah to his people :
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:2: ‘Warn your people before there come on them a painful chastisement’.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:3: He said, ‘O my people, I am indeed a plain warner to you,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:4: [to tell you] that [you should] worship God and fear Him and obey me,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:5: that He may forgive you some of your sins and defer you, until an appointed term.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:6: He said, ‘My Lord, I have summoned my people night and day,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:7: but my summon has only increased their evasion.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:8: And indeed whenever I summoned them, so that You might forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, and draw their cloaks over themselves, and they persist, and act in great arrogance.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:9: Then indeed I summoned them aloud;
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:10: then assuredly I proclaimed to them, and I confided to them secretly,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:12: He will release the heaven for you in torrents,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:13: and furnish you with wealth and sons, and assign to you gardens, and assign to you rivers.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:14: What is wrong with you that you do not hope for dignity from God,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:15: when verily He created you in stages?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:16: Have you not seen how God created seven heavens in layers,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:17: and made the moon therein as a light and made the sun as a lamp?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:18: And God has caused you to grow from the earth.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:19: Then He will make you return into it and bring you forth [with a veritable bringing forth].
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:20: And God has made the earth a flat
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:22: so that you may follow throughout it spacious routes” ’.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:23: Noah said, ‘My Lord, they have disobeyed me and followed those whose wealth and children, only add to their loss.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:24: And they have devised a mighty plot,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:25: and have said: “Do not abandon your gods, and do not abandon Wadd nor Suwā’, nor Yaghūth and Ya’ūq and Nasr”,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:26: And they have certainly led astray many.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:27: Because of their iniquities they were drowned then made to enter the Fire.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:28: And Noah said, ‘My Lord, do not leave from among the disbelievers a single dweller upon the earth.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:29: Assuredly if You leave them, they will lead Your servants astray, and will beget only disbelieving profligates.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 71:30: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house as a believer, and believing men and believing women, and do not increase the evildoers except in ruin’.

Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:1: Surely, We sent Nuh (Noah) to his people: ‘Warn your people before a painful torment comes upon them.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:2: He said: ‘O my people! Indeed, I am a clear Warner to you,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:3: That you must worship Allah and fear Him and obey me.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:4: He will forgive your sins and will give you respite till an appointed term.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:5: Nuh (Noah) submitted: ‘O my Lord! Indeed, I kept calling my people night and day,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:6: But my calling did no good except making them flee away.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:7: And every time I called them (towards faith) so that You might forgive them, they only thrust their fingers into their ears and wrapped their clothes over themselves and stuck obstinately (to disbelief) and behaved most arrogantly.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:9: Then I advised them publicly and privately and secretly (as well).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:10: Then I said: ‘Seek forgiveness from your Lord.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:11: He will send down on you torrents of rain,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:12: And will help you with wealth and sons and will grow for you gardens and will make streams flow for you.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:13: What is the matter with you that you do not have faith in, or the gnosis of, Allah’s Majesty,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:14: Whereas He has created you through diverse conditions?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:15: Have you not seen how Allah has created seven (or many) heavenly spheres corresponding to one another (layer upon layer)?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:16: And He brightened in them the moon and made the sun a radiant lamp (i.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:17: And Allah has caused you to grow like vegetation from the earth.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:18: Then He will return you into the same (earth) and will then bring you forth (from the same again).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:19: And Allah has made the earth a vast expanse for you,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:20: So that you may move around through its broad ways.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:21: Nuh (Noah) submitted: ‘O my Lord! They have disobeyed me and kept following that (class of the rebellious rich) whose wealth and children have not increased for them anything but loss.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:22: And they kept perpetrating huge frauds (to keep the common man in error).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:23: And they kept saying: Do not turn away from your gods and never abandon (the idols named as) Wadd, Suwa‘, Yaghuth, Ya‘uq and Nasr (as well).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:24: And truly, they have misled many people.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:25: (In the end) they were drowned due to their sins and then flung into Fire.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:26: And Nuh (Noah) submitted: ‘O my Lord! Do not leave even a single disbeliever living on earth.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:27: Surely, if You leave them (alive), they will keep leading your servants astray and will beget none but the most wicked and extremely disbelieving children.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 71:28: O my Lord! Forgive me and my parents and everyone who enters my home as a believer and (all) the believing men and the believing women, and do not increase anything for the wrongdoers except destruction.

null.verse 71:1: Totisesti Me lähetimme Nooan oman kansansa eteen sanoen: »Varoita kansaasi, ennenkuin tuskallinen rangaistus sen yllättää!»
null.verse 71:2: Hän julisti: »Kansa, totisesti olen julkinen varoittajasi.
null.verse 71:3: Palvelkaa Jumalaa, tarkoin täyttäen velvollisuutenne Häntä kohtaan, ja olkaa kuuliaisia minulle,
null.verse 71:4: niin Hän antaa teille syntinne anteeksi ja myöntää teille armonaikaa.
null.verse 71:5: Hän sanoi: »Herra, katso, olen vedonnut kansaani päivin ja öin,
null.verse 71:6: mutta saarnani on heissä vain lisännyt vastahakoisuutta.
null.verse 71:7: Ja katso, vaikka kuinka usein olisin heitä kutsunut, jotta Sinä voisit antaa heille anteeksi, tukkivat he sormin korvansa ja kietoutuvat vaatteisiinsa torjuen kaiken itsepintaisesti ja paisuen ylpeydessään.
null.verse 71:8: Silloin totisesti saarnasin heille äänekkäästi
null.verse 71:9: huusin kaikkien kuullen, haastoinpa heille myös kahden kesken
null.verse 71:10: sanoen: 'Pyytäkää Herraltanne anteeksiantoa - Hän on totisesti armahtavainen -
null.verse 71:11: Hän lähettää päällenne pilvet ja runsaan sateen,
null.verse 71:12: enentää teille rikkautta ja lapsia sekä luo teitä varten paratiisin virtoineen.
null.verse 71:13: Miksi ette pyydä armolahjoja Jumalalta?
null.verse 71:14: Totisesti, Hänhän on luonut teidät eri vaiheiden kautta.
null.verse 71:15: Ettekö näe, kuinka Jumala on luonut seitsemän taivasta toinen toisensa yläpuolelle?
null.verse 71:16: Hän on myös asettanut niille kuun valoksi ja auringon lampuksi.
null.verse 71:17: Jumala on kasvattanut teidät maasta,
null.verse 71:18: Hän käskee teidän myöskin palata siihen ja antaa teille ylösnousemuksen.
null.verse 71:19: Teitä varten Jumala on levittänyt maan ääret
null.verse 71:20: vaeltaaksenne sen avarilla teillä.
null.verse 71:21: Nooa sanoi: »Herra, totisesti he ovat olleet minua kohtaan uppiniskaisia ja pitäneet niitä esikuvinaan, joiden rikkaus ja lapset vain lisäävät heidän turmelustaan.
null.verse 71:22: He ovat punoneet monia juonia
null.verse 71:23: ja sanovat: 'Älkää suinkaan hylätkö jumalianne, Waddia ja Suwaa, Jaguutia, Jaukia ja Nasria!'
null.verse 71:24: Näin he ovat totisesti johtaneet monia harhaan, ja villitys käy yhä suuremmaksi jumalattomien keskuudessa.
null.verse 71:25: Heidät hukutettiin vääryyksiensä tähden, ja heidän oli käytävä tuleen, eikä heillä ollut muita auttajia kuin Jumala.
null.verse 71:26: Ja Nooa sanoi: »Herra, älä jätä maan päälle ainoatakaan jumalatonta asumaan!
null.verse 71:27: Totisesti, jos säästät heistä ketään, he johtavat palvelijasi harhaan ja siittävät irstaita ja epäuskoisia jälkeläisiä.
null.verse 71:28: Herra, anna anteeksi minulle ja vanhemmilleni; niin myös jokaiselle, joka uskossa astuu talooni, sekä kaikille uskoville, miehille ja naisille! Mutta jumalattomille tuota turmio!»

Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:1: Oui, Nous avons envoyé Noé à son peuple : " Avertis ton peuple avant qu'un douloureux châtiment ne l'atteigne ! "
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:2: Il dit : " O mon peuple ! Je suis pour vous un avertisseur explicite.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:3: Adorez Dieu et craignez-Le, et obéissez-moi !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:4: Il vous pardonnera vos péchés et Il vous accordera un délai jusqu'à un terme fixé ; mais quand vient le terme fixé par Dieu, il ne peut être différé.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:5: Il dit : " Mon Seigneur ! J'ai appelé mon peuple nuit et jour,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:6: mais mon appel n'a fait qu'augmenter son éloignement.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:7: Chaque fois que je les ai appelés pour que Tu leur pardonnes, ils se sont mis les doigts dans les oreilles, ils se sont enveloppés dans leur vêtements, ils se sont obstinés et ont fait preuve d'un orgueil invétéré.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:8: Je les ai ensuite appelés à voix haute,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:9: j'ai fait des proclamations et je leur ai parlé en secret.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:10: J'ai dit : "Implorez le pardon de votre Seigneur, car Il est Celui qui pardonne généreusement.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:11: Il vous fera descendre du ciel une pluie abondante ;
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:12: Il vous assistera par des richesses et des enfants ; Il vous donnera des jardins et vous donnera des rivières.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:13: Pourquoi n'espérez-vous pas en Dieu avec révérence,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:14: Lui qui vous a créés par phases successives ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:15: N'avez-vous pas vu comment Dieu a créé sept cieux superposés ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:16: Il y a placé la lune comme une lumière ; Il y a placé le soleil comme une lampe.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:17: Dieu vous a fait croître de la terre comme les plantes.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:18: Ensuite, Il vous y renverra, et Il vous en fera ressurgir.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:19: Dieu a fait pour vous de la terre un tapis
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:20: afin que vous puissiez en parcourir les voies spacieuses" ".
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:21: Noé dit encore : " Mon Seigneur, ils m'ont désobéi et ils ont suivi celui dont les richesses et les enfants n'ont fait qu'accroître leur perte.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:22: Ils ont tramé un vaste complot
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:23: et ils ont dit : "N'abandonnez pas vos divinités : n'abandonnez ni Wadd, ni Souwa', ni Yaghouth, ni Ya'ouq, ni Nasr !"
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:24: Ainsi ils ont égaré des multitudes.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:25: A cause de leurs fautes, ils furent noyés, puis introduits dans un feu, et ils n'ont trouvé aucun protecteur à la place de Dieu.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:26: Noé dit : " Mon Seigneur ! Ne laisse sur la terre aucun habitant qui soit du nombre des mécréants.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:27: Si Tu les épargnais, ils égareraient Tes serviteurs et ils n'engendreraient que des négateurs pervertis.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 71:28: Mon Seigneur ! Pardonne-moi ainsi qu'à mes père et mère, et à quiconque entre dans ma maison en ayant la foi, ainsi qu'aux croyants et aux croyantes.

Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:1: Nous avons envoyé Noé vers son peuple : «Avertis ton peuple, avant que leur vienne un châtiment douloureux».
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:3: dit : «ô mon peuple, je suis vraiment pour vous, un avertisseur clair,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:5: pour qu’Il vous pardonne vos péchés et qu’Il vous donne un délai jusqu’à un terme fixé.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:6: Il dit : «Seigneur ! J’ai appelé mon peuple, nuit et jour.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:7: Mais mon appel n’a fait qu’accroître leur fuite.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:8: Et chaque fois que je les ai appelés pour que Tu leur pardonnes, ils ont mis leurs doigts dans leurs oreilles, se sont enveloppés de leurs vêtements, se sont entêtés et se sont montrés extrêmement orgueilleux.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:9: Ensuite, je les ai appelés ouvertement.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:10: Puis, je leur ai fait des proclamations publiques, et des confidences en secret.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:11: J’ai donc dit : «Implorez le pardon de votre Seigneur, car Il est grand Pardonneur,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:12: pour qu’Il vous envoie du ciel, des pluies abondante,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:13: et qu’Il vous accorde beaucoup de biens et d’enfants, et vous donne des jardins et vous donne des rivières.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:14: Qu’avez-vous à ne pas vénérer Dieu comme il se doit,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:15: alors qu’Il vous a créés par phases successives ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:16: N’avez-vous pas vu comment Dieu a créé sept cieux superposés
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:17: et y a fait de la lune une lumière et du soleil une lampe ?
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:18: Et c’est Dieu qui, de la terre, vous a fait croître comme des plantes,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:19: puis Il vous y fera retourner et vous en fera sortir véritablement.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:20: Et c’est Dieu qui vous a fait de la terre un tapis,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:21: pour que vous vous acheminiez par ses voies spacieuses».
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:22: Noé dit : «Seigneur, ils m’ont désobéi et ils ont suivi celui dont les biens et les enfants n’ont fait qu’accroître la perte.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:23: Ils ont ourdi un immense stratagème,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:24: et ils ont dit : «N’abandonnez jamais vos divinités et n’abandonnez jamais Wadd, Suwaa, Yagout, Yaouq et Nasr .
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:25: Elles [les idoles] ont déjà égaré plusieurs.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:26: A cause de leurs fautes, ils ont été noyés, puis on les a fait entrer au Feu, et ils n’ont pas trouvé en dehors de Dieu, de secoureurs».
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:27: Et Noé dit : «Seigneur, ne laisse sur la terre aucun infidèle.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:28: Si Tu les laisses [en vie], ils égareront Tes serviteurs et n’engendreront que des pécheurs infidèles.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 71:29: Seigneur ! Pardonne-moi, et à mes père et mère et à celui qui entre dans ma demeure croyante, ainsi qu’aux croyants et croyantes; et ne fait croître les injustes qu’en perdition».

null.verse 71:1: Wir sandten Noah zu seinem Volk (und sprachen): «Warne dein Volk, bevor über sie eine schmerzliche Strafe kommt.
null.verse 71:2: Er sprach: «O mein Volk! wahrlich, ich bin euch ein aufklärender Warner,
null.verse 71:3: Daß ihr Allah dienet und Ihn fürchtet und mir gehorchet.
null.verse 71:4: Er wird euch eure Sünden vergeben und euch Aufschub gewähren bis zu einer bestimmten Frist.
null.verse 71:5: Er sprach: «Mein Herr, ich habe mein Volke gerufen bei Nacht und bei Tag,
null.verse 71:6: Doch mein Rufen hat nur ihre Abwendung verstärkt.
null.verse 71:7: Sooft ich sie rief, daß Du ihnen vergeben möchtest, steckten sie ihre Finger in die Ohren und hüllten sich in ihre Gewänder und verharrten (im Frevel) und wurden allzu hochfahrend.
null.verse 71:8: Dann rief ich sie offen auf.
null.verse 71:9: Dann predigte ich ihnen öffentlich, und ich redete zu ihnen insgeheim,
null.verse 71:10: Und ich sprach: "Suchet eures Herrn Verzeihung, denn Er ist allverzeihend.
null.verse 71:11: Er wird Regen für euch herniedersenden in Fülle
null.verse 71:12: Und wird euch mit Glücksgütern und Kindern stärken und wird euch Gärten bescheren und für euch Flüsse schaffen.
null.verse 71:13: Was ist euch, daß ihr von Allah nicht Weisheit und Gesetztheit erwartet,
null.verse 71:14: Da Er euch doch in verschiedenen Stufen und verschiedenen Formen erschaffen hat?
null.verse 71:15: Habt ihr nicht gesehen, wie Allah sieben Himmel in vollkommenem Einklang geschaffen hat,
null.verse 71:16: Und den Mond in sie gesetzt hat als ein Licht und die Sonne gemacht hat zu einer Lampe?
null.verse 71:17: Und Allah hat euch aus der Erde wachsen lassen wie eine Pflanzung.
null.verse 71:18: Dann wird Er euch wieder in sie zurückkehren lassen, und Er wird euch hervorbringen in (neuer) Geburt.
null.verse 71:19: Und Allah hat die Erde für euch zu einem weit offenen Bette gemacht,
null.verse 71:20: Auf daß ihr auf ihren breiten Straßen ziehen möget.
null.verse 71:21: Noah sprach: «Mein Herr, sie haben mir nicht gehorcht und sind einem gefolgt, dessen Reichtum und Kinder nur seinen Verlust gemehrt haben.
null.verse 71:22: Und sie haben einen schrecklichen Plan entworfen.
null.verse 71:23: Und sie sprechen (zueinander): "Verlasset eure Götter auf keine Weise.
null.verse 71:24: Und sie haben viele verführt; drum mehre die Frevler in nichts als im Irrtum.
null.verse 71:25: Ob ihrer Sünden wurden sie ertränkt und in ein Feuer gebracht.
null.verse 71:26: Und Noah sprach: «Mein Herr, laß im Lande (auch) nicht einen einzigen von den Ungläubigen;
null.verse 71:27: Denn wenn Du sie lässest, so werden sie nur Deine Diener verführen und werden nur eine tief frevlerische (Nachkommenschaft) von hartnäckigen Ungläubigen zeugen.
null.verse 71:28: Mein Herr, vergib mir und meinen Eltern und dem, der mein Haus gläubig betritt, und den gläubigen Männern und den gläubigen Frauen; und mehre die Frevler in nichts als in der Vernichtung.
